arabicText: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ أَوْفُوا۟ بِٱلْعُقُودِ ۚ أُحِلَّتْ لَكُم بَهِيمَةُ ٱلْأَنْعَـٰمِ إِلَّا مَا يُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْكُمْ غَيْرَ مُحِلِّى ٱلصَّيْدِ وَأَنتُمْ حُرُمٌ ۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَحْكُمُ مَا يُرِيدُ
englishTranslationText:
O	 People	 who	 Believe!	 Fulfil	 your	 words	
(agreements);	 the	mute	 animals	 are	made	
lawful	for	you	(to	eat)	except	what	will	be	
declared	 to	 you	 after	 this,	 but	 do	 not	
assume	hunting	as	lawful	when	you	are	on	
the	 pilgrimage;	 indeed	 Allah commands	
whatever	He	wills.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	Imān	wāloñ!	Apne	qaul	(áhad	)	poore	
karo;	 tumhāre	 liye	 halāl	 huye	 bezabān	
maweshi	magar	woh	jo	āage	sunāya	jāyega	
tum	 ko,	 lekin	 shikār	 halāl	 na	 samjho	 jab	
tum	 ehrām	 meiñ	 ho;	 beshak	 Allah	 ḥukm	
farmāta	hai	jo	chāhe

arabicText: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ لَا تُحِلُّوا۟ شَعَـٰٓئِرَ ٱللَّهِ وَلَا ٱلشَّهْرَ ٱلْحَرَامَ وَلَا ٱلْهَدْىَ وَلَا ٱلْقَلَـٰٓئِدَ وَلَآ ءَآمِّينَ ٱلْبَيْتَ ٱلْحَرَامَ يَبْتَغُونَ فَضْلًۭا مِّن رَّبِّهِمْ وَرِضْوَٰنًۭا ۚ وَإِذَا حَلَلْتُمْ فَٱصْطَادُوا۟ ۚ وَلَا يَجْرِمَنَّكُمْ شَنَـَٔانُ قَوْمٍ أَن صَدُّوكُمْ عَنِ ٱلْمَسْجِدِ ٱلْحَرَامِ أَن تَعْتَدُوا۟ ۘ وَتَعَاوَنُوا۟ عَلَى ٱلْبِرِّ وَٱلتَّقْوَىٰ ۖ وَلَا تَعَاوَنُوا۟ عَلَى ٱلْإِثْمِ وَٱلْعُدْوَٰنِ ۚ وَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ ۖ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ شَدِيدُ ٱلْعِقَابِ
englishTranslationText:
O	People	who	Believe!	Do	not	make	lawful	
the	symbols	of	Allah nor	the	sacred	months	
nor	 the	 sacrificial	 animals	 sent	 to	 Sacred	
Territory	(around	Mecca)	nor	the	animals	marked	with	garlands,	nor	the	lives	and	wealth	of	those	
travelling	 towards	 the	Sacred	House	(Kaa’bah)	 seeking	 the	munificence	and	 pleasure	 of	 their	
Lord;	and	when	you	have	completed	the	pilgrimage,	you	may	hunt;	and	let	not	the	enmity	of	the	
people	who	had	stopped	you	from	going	to	the	Sacred	Masjid tempt	you	to	do	injustice;	and	help	
one	another	in	righteousness	and	piety	- and	do	not	help	one	another	in	sin	and	injustice	- and	
keep	fearing	Allah;	indeed	Allah’s	punishment	is	severe.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	Imān	wāloñ!	Halāl	na	thahra	lo	Allah	ke	nishān	aur	na	adab	wāle	mahine	aur	na	haram	ko	
bheji	huyi	qurbāniyāñ	aur	na	jinke	gale	meiñ	alāmateñ	āwezāñ,	aur	na	unka	māl	ābrū	jo	izzat	
wāle	ghar	ka	qasd	kar	ke	āyeñ	apne	Rab	ka	fazl	aur	uski	khushi	chāhte;	aur	jab	ehrām	se	niklo	to	
shikār	kar	sakte	ho;	aur	tumheiñ	kisi	qaum	ki	adāwat	ke	unhoñ	ne	tum	ko	Masjid-e-Harām se	
roka	tha	zyādati	karne	par	na	ubhārte;	aur	neki	aur	parhez-gāri	par	ek	doosre	ki	madad	karo	aur	
gunāh	aur	zyādati	par	bāham	madad	na	do aur	Allah	se	darte	raho	be-shak	Allah	ka	áƶāb sakht	
hai.

arabicText: حُرِّمَتْ عَلَيْكُمُ ٱلْمَيْتَةُ وَٱلدَّمُ وَلَحْمُ ٱلْخِنزِيرِ وَمَآ أُهِلَّ لِغَيْرِ ٱللَّهِ بِهِۦ وَٱلْمُنْخَنِقَةُ وَٱلْمَوْقُوذَةُ وَٱلْمُتَرَدِّيَةُ وَٱلنَّطِيحَةُ وَمَآ أَكَلَ ٱلسَّبُعُ إِلَّا مَا ذَكَّيْتُمْ وَمَا ذُبِحَ عَلَى ٱلنُّصُبِ وَأَن تَسْتَقْسِمُوا۟ بِٱلْأَزْلَـٰمِ ۚ ذَٰلِكُمْ فِسْقٌ ۗ ٱلْيَوْمَ يَئِسَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِن دِينِكُمْ فَلَا تَخْشَوْهُمْ وَٱخْشَوْنِ ۚ ٱلْيَوْمَ أَكْمَلْتُ لَكُمْ دِينَكُمْ وَأَتْمَمْتُ عَلَيْكُمْ نِعْمَتِى وَرَضِيتُ لَكُمُ ٱلْإِسْلَـٰمَ دِينًۭا ۚ فَمَنِ ٱضْطُرَّ فِى مَخْمَصَةٍ غَيْرَ مُتَجَانِفٍۢ لِّإِثْمٍۢ ۙ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٌۭ رَّحِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
Forbidden	 for	you	are	carrion,	and	blood,	
and	flesh	of	swine,	and	that	which	has	been	
slaughtered	while	proclaiming	the	name	of	
any	 other	 than	 Allah,	 and	 one	 killed	 by	
strangling,	 and	 one	 killed	 with	 blunt	
weapons,	 and	 one	 which	 died	 by	 falling,	
and	that	which	was	gored	by	the	horns	of	
some	 animal,	 and	 one	 eaten	 by	 a	 wild	
beast,	 except	 those	 whom	 you	 slaughter;	
and	 (also	 forbidden	 is)	 that	 which	 is	
slaughtered	at	the	altar	(of	idols)	and	that	
which	 is	 distributed	 by	 the	 throwing	 of	
arrows	(as	an	omen);	this is	an	act	of	sin;	
this	 day,	 the	 disbelievers	 are	 in	 despair	
concerning	 your	 religion,	 so	 do	 not	 fear	
them	and	fear	Me;	this	day	have	I	perfected	
your	religion	for	you	*	and	completed	My	
favour	upon	you,	and	have	chosen	Islam	as	
your	 religion;	 so	 whoever	 is	 forced	 by	
intense	 hunger	 and	 thirst	 and	 does	 not	
incline	 towards	 sin,	 then	 indeed	 Allah is	
Oft	 Forgiving,	 Most	 Merciful.	 (*Prophet	
Muhammad – peace	and	blessings	be	upon	
him	– is	the	Last	Prophet.)
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	par	harām	hai	murdār	aur	khoon	aur	
sooar	 ka	 gosht	 aur	 woh	 jiske	 zibah	 meiñ	
ghair-e-khuda	 ka	 nām	 pukāra	 gaya	 aur	
woh	jo	gala	ghoñtne	se	mare	aur	be-dhār	
ki	 cheez	 se	māra	 hua	aur	jo	gir	 kar	marā	
aur	jise	kisi	jānwar	ne	seeñg māra	aur	jise	
koi	 darinda	 kha	 gaya	 magar	 jinheñ	 tum	
Zibah	 kar	 lo	 aur	 jo	 kisi	 thān	 (bātil	
maboodoñ	 ke	 makhsoos	 nishānāt)	 par	
Zibah	 kiya	 gaya	 Aur	 pāñse	 dālker	 bāñta	
karna	 ye	 gunāh	 ka	 kām	 hai; āaj	 tumhāre	
Deen	ki	taraf	se	kāfiroñ	ki	āas	toot	gayi,	to	
unse	na	daro	aur	Mujhse	daro	āaj	Maiñ	ne	
tumhāre	liye	tumhāra	Deen	kāmil	kar	diya,	
aur	 tum	par	apni	N’emat	poori	kar	di,	aur	
tumhāre	liye	Islām	ko	deen	pasand	kiya;	to	
jo	 bhook	 piyās	 ki	 shiddat	 meiñ	 nāchār	
(majboor)	 ho	 yuñ	 ke	 gunāh	 ki	 taraf	 na	
jhuke,	 to	 be-shak	 Allah	 bakhsh	 ne	 wāla	
maherbān	hai

arabicText: يَسْـَٔلُونَكَ مَاذَآ أُحِلَّ لَهُمْ ۖ قُلْ أُحِلَّ لَكُمُ ٱلطَّيِّبَـٰتُ ۙ وَمَا عَلَّمْتُم مِّنَ ٱلْجَوَارِحِ مُكَلِّبِينَ تُعَلِّمُونَهُنَّ مِمَّا عَلَّمَكُمُ ٱللَّهُ ۖ فَكُلُوا۟ مِمَّآ أَمْسَكْنَ عَلَيْكُمْ وَٱذْكُرُوا۟ ٱسْمَ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيْهِ ۖ وَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَرِيعُ ٱلْحِسَابِ
englishTranslationText:
They	ask	you	(O	dear	Prophet	Muhammad
- peace	and	blessings	be	upon	him)	what	is	
made	lawful	for	them;	say,	“Pure	things	are	
made	lawful	 for	 you,	and	 the	 beasts	(and	
birds)	of	prey	which	you	have	trained	and	
use	for	hunting,	(and)	you	teach	them	what	
Allah has	taught	you;	so	eat	what	they	kill	and	leave	for	you,	and	mention	Allah’s	name	upon	it	-
and	keep	fearing	Allah;	indeed	Allah is	Swift	At	Taking	Account.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	 Mehboob tumse	 pooñchte	 haiñ	 ke	
unke	 liye	 kya	 halāl	 hua	 tum	 fama	 do	 ke	
halāl	 ki	 gayiñ	 tumhāre	 liye	 pāk	 cheezeñ,	
aur	jo	shikāri	jānwar	tumne	sadha	(sikha)	
liye	 unheñ	 shikār	 par	 doudāte	 jo	 ílm	
tumheñ	 khuda	 ne	 diya	 us	meiñ	 se	 unheñ	
sikhāte	to	khāo	us	meiñ	se	jo	woh	mār	kar	tumhāre	liye	rahne	deñ	aur	us	par	Allah	ka	nām	lo	aur	
Allah	se	darte	raho	be-shak	Allah	ko	hisāb	karte	der	nahiñ	lagti

arabicText: ٱلْيَوْمَ أُحِلَّ لَكُمُ ٱلطَّيِّبَـٰتُ ۖ وَطَعَامُ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُوا۟ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ حِلٌّۭ لَّكُمْ وَطَعَامُكُمْ حِلٌّۭ لَّهُمْ ۖ وَٱلْمُحْصَنَـٰتُ مِنَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنَـٰتِ وَٱلْمُحْصَنَـٰتُ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُوا۟ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ مِن قَبْلِكُمْ إِذَآ ءَاتَيْتُمُوهُنَّ أُجُورَهُنَّ مُحْصِنِينَ غَيْرَ مُسَـٰفِحِينَ وَلَا مُتَّخِذِىٓ أَخْدَانٍۢ ۗ وَمَن يَكْفُرْ بِٱلْإِيمَـٰنِ فَقَدْ حَبِطَ عَمَلُهُۥ وَهُوَ فِى ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ مِنَ ٱلْخَـٰسِرِينَ
englishTranslationText:
This	day	the	pure	things	are	made	lawful	for	you;	and	the	food	of	the	People	given	the	Book(s)	is	
lawful	for	you	- and	your	food	is	lawful	for	them	- and	likewise	are	the	virtuous	Muslim	women	
and	the	virtuous	women	from	the	people	who	received	the	Book(s)	before	you	when	you	give	
them	 their	 bridal	 money	 - marrying	 them,	 not	 committing	 adultery	 nor	 as	 mistresses;	 and	
whoever	turns	a	disbeliever	after	being	a	Muslim,	all	his	deeds	are	wasted	and	he	will	be	among	
the	losers	in	the	Hereafter.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Āaj	 tumhāre	 liye	 pāk	 chizeñ	 halāl	 huyiñ;	 aur	 kitābiyoñ	 ka	 khāna	 tumhāre	 liye	Halāl	 hai	 aur	
tumhāra	khāna	unke	liye	Halāl	hai	aur	pārsa	(pāk	dāman)	aurateiñ	Musalmān	aur	pārsa	aurateiñ	
un	meiñ	se	jinko	tum	se	pahle	Kitāb	mili	jab	tum	unheiñ	unke	mahar	do	qaid	meiñ	lāte	huye	na	
masti	nikālte	aur	na	āshna	banāte	aur	jo	musalmān	se	kāfir	ho	uska	kiya	dharā	sab	ikārat	(zā’e)	
gaya	aur	woh	ākhirat	meiñ	ziyāñkār	(nuqsān	uthāne	wāla)	hai

arabicText: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ إِذَا قُمْتُمْ إِلَى ٱلصَّلَوٰةِ فَٱغْسِلُوا۟ وُجُوهَكُمْ وَأَيْدِيَكُمْ إِلَى ٱلْمَرَافِقِ وَٱمْسَحُوا۟ بِرُءُوسِكُمْ وَأَرْجُلَكُمْ إِلَى ٱلْكَعْبَيْنِ ۚ وَإِن كُنتُمْ جُنُبًۭا فَٱطَّهَّرُوا۟ ۚ وَإِن كُنتُم مَّرْضَىٰٓ أَوْ عَلَىٰ سَفَرٍ أَوْ جَآءَ أَحَدٌۭ مِّنكُم مِّنَ ٱلْغَآئِطِ أَوْ لَـٰمَسْتُمُ ٱلنِّسَآءَ فَلَمْ تَجِدُوا۟ مَآءًۭ فَتَيَمَّمُوا۟ صَعِيدًۭا طَيِّبًۭا فَٱمْسَحُوا۟ بِوُجُوهِكُمْ وَأَيْدِيكُم مِّنْهُ ۚ مَا يُرِيدُ ٱللَّهُ لِيَجْعَلَ عَلَيْكُم مِّنْ حَرَجٍۢ وَلَـٰكِن يُرِيدُ لِيُطَهِّرَكُمْ وَلِيُتِمَّ نِعْمَتَهُۥ عَلَيْكُمْ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَشْكُرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
O	People	who	Believe!	When	you	wish	 to	
stand	up	for	prayer,	wash	your	faces,	and	
your	hands	up	to	the	elbows,	and	pass	wet	
palms	over	your	heads	and	wash	your	feet	
up	 to	 the	 ankles;	 and	if	 you	 need	 a	 bath,	
clean	yourselves	thoroughly;	and	if	you	are	
sick	or	on	a	journey,	or	one	of	you	returns	
from	answering	 the	call	of	nature,	or	you	
have	 cohabited	 with	 women,	 and	 you	 do	
not	find	water,	then	cleanse	(yourself)	with	
clean	 soil	 - therefore	 stroke	 your	 soiled	
palms	over	your	faces	and	your	hands	with	
it;	 Allah does	 not	 will	 to	 place	 you	 in	
hardship,	 but	He	wills	 to	 fully	 purify	 you	
and	complete	His	favour	upon	you,	so	that	
you	may	be	grateful.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	 Imān	 wāloñ	 jab	 Namāz	 ko	 khadhe	
hona	 chāho	 to	 apne	 muñh	 dho Aur	
kohniyoñ	 tak	 hāth	 aur	 saroñ	 ka	 masah	
karo	 aur	 gattoñ	 tak	 pāon	 dho	 aur	 agar	
tumheñ	nahāne ki	hājat	ho	to	khoob	suthre	
ho	lo	aur	agar	tum	bimār	ho	ya	safar	meiñ	
ho	ya	tum	meiñ	se	koi	qaza-e-hājat	se	āaya	
ya	 tum	 ne	 auratoñ	 se	 sohbat	 ki	 aur	 in	
suratoñ	meiñ	pāni	na	pāya	to	pāk	mitti	se	
tayammum	karo	to	apne	muñh	aur	hāthoñ	
ka	is	se	masah	karo	Allah	nahiñ	chāhta	ke	
tum	par	kuch	tangi	rakhe	hāñ	ye	chāhta	hai	
ke	 tumheñ	 khoob	 suthra	 kar	 de	 aur	 apni	
n’emat	tum	par	poori	kar	de	ke	kahiñ	tum	
ehsān	māno.

arabicText: وَٱذْكُرُوا۟ نِعْمَةَ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيْكُمْ وَمِيثَـٰقَهُ ٱلَّذِى وَاثَقَكُم بِهِۦٓ إِذْ قُلْتُمْ سَمِعْنَا وَأَطَعْنَا ۖ وَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلِيمٌۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ
englishTranslationText:
And	 remember	 Allah’s	 favour	 upon	 you	
and	the	covenant	He	took	from	you	when	
you	said,	“We	hear	and	we	obey”	- and	fear
Allah;	indeed	Allah knows	what	lies	within	
the	hearts.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	yād	karo	Allah	ka	ehsān	apne	ūper	aur	
woh	áhad	jo	usne	tum	se	liya	jab	ke tum	ne	
kahā	ham	ne	suna	aur	māna	aur	Allah	se	daro	be-shak	Allah	diloñ	ki	bāt	jānta	hai

arabicText: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ كُونُوا۟ قَوَّٰمِينَ لِلَّهِ شُهَدَآءَ بِٱلْقِسْطِ ۖ وَلَا يَجْرِمَنَّكُمْ شَنَـَٔانُ قَوْمٍ عَلَىٰٓ أَلَّا تَعْدِلُوا۟ ۚ ٱعْدِلُوا۟ هُوَ أَقْرَبُ لِلتَّقْوَىٰ ۖ وَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ خَبِيرٌۢ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	Imān	wāloñ	Allah	ke	ḥukm	par	khoob	qāim	ho	jāo	insāf	ke	sāth	gawāhi	dete	aur	tumko	kisi	
qaum	 ki	ádāwat	 (dushmani)	is	 par	 na	 ubhāre	 ke	insāf	 na	 karo	insāf	 karo	woh	parhez-gāri	 se	
ziyādah	qarib	hai	aur	Allah	se	daro	be-shak	Allah	ko	tumhāre	kāmoñ	ki	khabar	hai

arabicText: وَعَدَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ ۙ لَهُم مَّغْفِرَةٌۭ وَأَجْرٌ عَظِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
It	is	Allah’s	promise	to	those	who	believe	and	are	righteous,	that	for	them	will	be	forgiveness	and	
a	great	reward.
romanUrduTranslationText: Imān	wāle	neko	kāroñ	se	Allah	ka	w’ada	hai	ke	unke	liye	bakhshish	aur	bada	sawāb	hai.

arabicText: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ وَكَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَآ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلْجَحِيمِ
englishTranslationText:
And	 those	 who	 disbelieve	 and	 deny	 Our	
signs	- it	is	they	who	are	the	people	of	hell.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 woh	 jinhoñe	 kufr	 kiya	 aur	 hamāri	
Āyateiñ	jhutlāyiñ	wohi	dozakh	wāle	haiñ.

arabicText: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ ٱذْكُرُوا۟ نِعْمَتَ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيْكُمْ إِذْ هَمَّ قَوْمٌ أَن يَبْسُطُوٓا۟ إِلَيْكُمْ أَيْدِيَهُمْ فَكَفَّ أَيْدِيَهُمْ عَنكُمْ ۖ وَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ ۚ وَعَلَى ٱللَّهِ فَلْيَتَوَكَّلِ ٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ
englishTranslationText:
O	People	who	Believe!	Remember	Allah’s	
favour	upon	you,	when	a	people	wished	to	
extend	 their	 hands	 against	 you,	 so	 He	
restrained	their	hands	from	you;	and	keep	
fearing	Allah;	and	Muslims	must	rely	only	
upon	Allah.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	Imān	wāloñ	Allah	ka	ehsān	apne	ūper	
yād	karo	jab	ek	qaum		ne	chāha	ke	tum	par	
dast	 darāzi	 kareñ	 to	 usne	 unke	 hāth	 tum	
par	 se	 rok	 diye	 aur Allah	 se	 daro	 aur	
Musalmānoñ	 ko	 Allah	 hi	 par	 bharosa	
chāhiye.

arabicText: ۞ وَلَقَدْ أَخَذَ ٱللَّهُ مِيثَـٰقَ بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ وَبَعَثْنَا مِنْهُمُ ٱثْنَىْ عَشَرَ نَقِيبًۭا ۖ وَقَالَ ٱللَّهُ إِنِّى مَعَكُمْ ۖ لَئِنْ أَقَمْتُمُ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتَيْتُمُ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَءَامَنتُم بِرُسُلِى وَعَزَّرْتُمُوهُمْ وَأَقْرَضْتُمُ ٱللَّهَ قَرْضًا حَسَنًۭا لَّأُكَفِّرَنَّ عَنكُمْ سَيِّـَٔاتِكُمْ وَلَأُدْخِلَنَّكُمْ جَنَّـٰتٍۢ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ ۚ فَمَن كَفَرَ بَعْدَ ذَٰلِكَ مِنكُمْ فَقَدْ ضَلَّ سَوَآءَ ٱلسَّبِيلِ
englishTranslationText:
Undoubtedly	Allah made	a	covenant	with	
the	 Descendants	 of	 Israel,	 and	 We	
appointed	twelve	chiefs	among	them;	and	
Allah said,	“Indeed	I	am	with	you;	surely,	if	
you	 establish	 the	 prayer	 and	 pay	 the	
charity,	 and	 believe	 in	 My	 Noble	
Messengers	 and	 respect*	 them,	 and	 lend	
an	 excellent	 loan	 to	 Allah,	 I	 will	 surely	
forgive	 your	 sins,	 and	 I	 will	 surely	 admit	
you	 into	 Gardens	 beneath	 which	 rivers	
flow;	 then	 after	 this,	 if	 any	 of	 you	
disbelieves,	 he	 has	 certainly	 gone	 astray	
from	 the	 Straight	 Path."	 (To	 honour	 the	
Holy	Prophet	– peace	and	blessings	be	upon	
him	– is	 part	 of	faith.	To	 disrespect	 him	is	
blasphemy.)
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 be-shak	 Allah	 ne	Bani-Isrāil	 se	 ‘ahad		
liya	aur	ham	ne	un	meiñ	bārah	sardār	qāim	
kiye	 aur	 Allah	 ne	 farmāya	 be-shak	 maiñ	
tumhāre	sāth	hooñ	zaroor	agar	tum	namāz	
qāim	 rakho	 aur	 zakāt	 do	 aur	 mere	
Rasooloñ	par	Imān	lāo	aur	unki	t’azim	karo	
aur	 Allah	 ko	 qarze	 hasan	 do,	 to	 be-shak	
maiñ	 tumhāre	 gunāh	 utār	 dooñga	 aur	
zaroor	tumheñ	bāghoñ	meiñ	le	jāūnga	jinke	niche	nahreñ	rawāñ	phir	iske	b’ad	jo	tum	meiñ	se	
kufr	kare	woh	zaroor	sidhi	rāh	se	bahka.

arabicText: فَبِمَا نَقْضِهِم مِّيثَـٰقَهُمْ لَعَنَّـٰهُمْ وَجَعَلْنَا قُلُوبَهُمْ قَـٰسِيَةًۭ ۖ يُحَرِّفُونَ ٱلْكَلِمَ عَن مَّوَاضِعِهِۦ ۙ وَنَسُوا۟ حَظًّۭا مِّمَّا ذُكِّرُوا۟ بِهِۦ ۚ وَلَا تَزَالُ تَطَّلِعُ عَلَىٰ خَآئِنَةٍۢ مِّنْهُمْ إِلَّا قَلِيلًۭا مِّنْهُمْ ۖ فَٱعْفُ عَنْهُمْ وَٱصْفَحْ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُحِبُّ ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
englishTranslationText:
So	We	 cursed	 them	 because	 of	 them	 constantly	 breaking	 their	 covenant,	 and	 hardened	 their	
hearts;	they	shift	the	Words	of	Allah from	their	places,	and	have	forgotten	a	large	portion	of	the	
advices	that	were	given	to	them;	and	you	will	constantly	learn	of	deceits	from	them,	except	a	few;	
so	forgive	them	and	excuse	them;	indeed	Allah loves	the	virtuous.
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	unki	kaisi	bad	’ahadiyoñ	par	ham	ne	unheñ	l’anat		ki	aur	unke	dil	sakht	kar	diye	Allah	ki	bātoñ	
ko	unke	thikānoñ	se	badalte	haiñ	aur	bhula	baithe	bada	hissa	un	nasihatoñ	ka	jo	unheñ	di	gayiñ	
aur	tum	hamesha	unki	ek	na	ek	daghā	par	muttal’a	hote	rahoge	siwa	thodoñ	ke	to	unheñ	muāf	
kar	do	aur	unse	dar-guzar;	beshak	ehsān	wāle	Allah	ko	mehboob	haiñ

arabicText: وَمِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّا نَصَـٰرَىٰٓ أَخَذْنَا مِيثَـٰقَهُمْ فَنَسُوا۟ حَظًّۭا مِّمَّا ذُكِّرُوا۟ بِهِۦ فَأَغْرَيْنَا بَيْنَهُمُ ٱلْعَدَاوَةَ وَٱلْبَغْضَآءَ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ ۚ وَسَوْفَ يُنَبِّئُهُمُ ٱللَّهُ بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَصْنَعُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	We	made	a	covenant	with	those	who	
proclaimed,	 “We	 are	 Christians”	 - they	
then	 forgot	a	large	portion	of	 the	advices	
given	to	them;	We	have	therefore	instilled	
enmity	 and	 hatred	 between	 them	 till	 the	
Day	 of	 Resurrection;	 and	 Allah will	 soon	
inform	them	of	what	they	were	doing.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 woh	 jinhone	 d’awa	 kiya	 ham	Nasāra	
haiñ	 hamne	 unse	 áhad liya	 to	 woh	 bhula	
baithe	bada	hissa	un	nasihatoñ	ka	jo	unheñ	
di	 gayiñ	 to	 ham	 ne	 unke	 āpas	 meiñ	
Qayāmat	 ke	 din	 tak	 bair	 (dushmani)	 aur	
bughz	dāl	diya	aur	án-qareeb	Allah	unheñ	
bata	dega	Jo	kuch	karte	the.

arabicText: يَـٰٓأَهْلَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ قَدْ جَآءَكُمْ رَسُولُنَا يُبَيِّنُ لَكُمْ كَثِيرًۭا مِّمَّا كُنتُمْ تُخْفُونَ مِنَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ وَيَعْفُوا۟ عَن كَثِيرٍۢ ۚ قَدْ جَآءَكُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ نُورٌۭ وَكِتَـٰبٌۭ مُّبِينٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
O	 People	 given	 the	 Book(s)!	 Indeed	 this	
Noble	 Messenger	 (Prophet	 Muhammad -
peace	 and	 blessings	 be	 upon	 him)	of	Ours	
has	come	to	you,	revealing	to	you	a	lot	of	
the	 things	 which	 you	 had	 hidden	 in	 the	
Book,	and	 forgiving	a	lot	 of	 them;	indeed	
towards	you	has	come	a	light	*	from	Allah,	
and	a	clear	Book.	(*	The	Holy	Prophet	is	a	
light	from	Allah).
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	 kitāb	 waloñ	 be-shak	 tumhāre	 pās	
hamāre	ye	Rasool	 tashrif	lāye	ke	 tum	par	
zāhir	farmāte	haiñ	bahut	si	woh	chizeñ	jo	
tumne	 kitāb	 meiñ	 chhupa	 dāli	 thin	 aur	
bahut	 si	 muāf	 farmāte	 haiñ	 beshak	
tumhāre	pās	Allah	ki	taraf	se	ek	Noor āya	
aur	Raushan	Kitab.

arabicText: يَهْدِى بِهِ ٱللَّهُ مَنِ ٱتَّبَعَ رِضْوَٰنَهُۥ سُبُلَ ٱلسَّلَـٰمِ وَيُخْرِجُهُم مِّنَ ٱلظُّلُمَـٰتِ إِلَى ٱلنُّورِ بِإِذْنِهِۦ وَيَهْدِيهِمْ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطٍۢ مُّسْتَقِيمٍۢ
englishTranslationText:
With	 it,	 Allah guides	 whoever	 obeys	 the	
will	 of	 Allah to	 the	 paths	 of	 peace,	 and	
takes	 them	 out	 of	darkness	 towards	light	
by	His	command,	and	guides	 them	 to	 the	
Straight	Path
romanUrduTranslationText:
Allah	is	se	hidāyat	deta	hai use	jo	Allah	ki	
marzi	par	chala	salāmati	ke	rāste	aur	unheñ	andheriyoñ	se	raushni	ki	taraf	le	jāta	hai	apne	ḥukm	
se	aur	unheñ	sidhi	rāh	dikhāta	hai.

arabicText: لَّقَدْ كَفَرَ ٱلَّذِينَ قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلْمَسِيحُ ٱبْنُ مَرْيَمَ ۚ قُلْ فَمَن يَمْلِكُ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ شَيْـًٔا إِنْ أَرَادَ أَن يُهْلِكَ ٱلْمَسِيحَ ٱبْنَ مَرْيَمَ وَأُمَّهُۥ وَمَن فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ جَمِيعًۭا ۗ وَلِلَّهِ مُلْكُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا ۚ يَخْلُقُ مَا يَشَآءُ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍۢ قَدِيرٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
They	 have	 indeed	 become	 disbelievers	
who	say,	“Messiah,	the	son	of	Maryam	is	certainly	Allah”;	say,	“Who	can	then	do	anything	against	
Allah,	if	He	wills	 to	destroy	 the	Messiah,	 the	son	of	Maryam,	and	his	mother	and	everyone	on	
earth?”	And	for	Allah only	is	the	kingship	of	the	heavens	and	the	earth	and	all	that	is	between	
them;	He	creates	whatever	He	wills;	and	Allah is	Able	to	do	all	things.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Beshak	kāfir	huye	woh	jinhone	kaha	ke	Allah	Maseeh	bin Maryam hi	hai;	Tum	farma	do	phir	Allah	
ka	koi	kya	kar	sakta	hai	agar	woh	chāhe	ke	halāk	kar	de Maseeh	bin Maryam aur	uski	māñ	aur	
tamām	zameen	wāloñ	ko	aur	Allah	hi	ke	liye	hai	saltanat	āsmānoñ	aur	zameen	aur	inke	darmiyān	
ki	jo	chāhe	paida	karta	hai	aur	Allah	sab	kuch	kar	sakta	hai.

arabicText: وَقَالَتِ ٱلْيَهُودُ وَٱلنَّصَـٰرَىٰ نَحْنُ أَبْنَـٰٓؤُا۟ ٱللَّهِ وَأَحِبَّـٰٓؤُهُۥ ۚ قُلْ فَلِمَ يُعَذِّبُكُم بِذُنُوبِكُم ۖ بَلْ أَنتُم بَشَرٌۭ مِّمَّنْ خَلَقَ ۚ يَغْفِرُ لِمَن يَشَآءُ وَيُعَذِّبُ مَن يَشَآءُ ۚ وَلِلَّهِ مُلْكُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا ۖ وَإِلَيْهِ ٱلْمَصِيرُ
englishTranslationText:
The	Jews	and	the	Christians	said,	“We	are	
the	 sons	 of	Allah and	 His	 beloved	 ones”;	
say,	 “Why	 does	 He	 then	 punish	 you	 for	
your	 sins?	 In	 fact	 you	 are	 human	 beings,	
part	 of	 His	 creation;	 He	 forgives	
whomever	 He	 wills,	 and	 punishes	
whomever	He	wills;	and	 for	Allah only	is	
the	kingship	of	the	heavens	and	the	earth	
and	all	that	is	between	them	- and	towards	
Him	is	the	return.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	Yahūdi	aur	Nasrāni	bole	ke	ham	Allah	
ke	bete	aur	uske	piyāre	haiñ;	tum	farma	do	
phir	 tumheñ	 kyuñ	 tumhāre	 gunāhoñ	 par	
‘aƶāb		farmāta	hai?	Balke	tum	ādmi	ho,	uski	
makhlūqāt se;	jise	chāhe	bakhshta	hai	aur	
jise	chāhe	sazā		deta	hai	aur	Allah	hi	ke	liye	
hai	 saltanat	 āsmānoñ	 aur	 zameen	 aur	 un	
ke	darmiyān	ki	aur	usi	ki	taraf	phirna	hai.

arabicText: يَـٰٓأَهْلَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ قَدْ جَآءَكُمْ رَسُولُنَا يُبَيِّنُ لَكُمْ عَلَىٰ فَتْرَةٍۢ مِّنَ ٱلرُّسُلِ أَن تَقُولُوا۟ مَا جَآءَنَا مِنۢ بَشِيرٍۢ وَلَا نَذِيرٍۢ ۖ فَقَدْ جَآءَكُم بَشِيرٌۭ وَنَذِيرٌۭ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍۢ قَدِيرٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
O	 People	 given	 the	 Book(s)!	 Indeed	 this	
Noble	 Messenger	 (Prophet	 Muhammad -
peace	 and	 blessings	 be	 upon	 him)	of	Ours	
has	 come	 to	 you,	 revealing	 to	 you	 Our	
commands,	 after	 the	 Noble	 Messengers	
had	 stopped	 arriving	 for	 ages,	 for	 you	
might	claim,	 “Never	did	any	Harbinger	of	
Glad	Tidings	or	Herald	of	Warning	come	to	
us”	- so	this	Harbinger	of	Glad	Tidings	and	
Herald	 of	Warning	 has	 come	 to	 you;	 and	
Allah is	Able	to	do	all	things.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	 Kitāb	 wāloñ	 be-shak	 tumhāre	 pās	
hamāre	ye	Rasool	tashrif	lāye	ke	tum	par	
hamāre	 ahkām	 zāhir	 farmāte	 haiñ	 b’ad	
iske	 ke	Rasooloñ	 ka	 āna	 muddatoñ	 band	
raha	 tha	 ke	 tum	 kaho	 hamare	 pās	 koi	
khushi	aur	dar	sunāne	wāla	nahiñ	āya	to	ye	
khushi	aur	dar	sunāne	wāle	 tumhāre	pās	
tashreef	lāye	haiñ	aur	Allah	ko	sab	qudrat	
hai

arabicText: وَإِذْ قَالَ مُوسَىٰ لِقَوْمِهِۦ يَـٰقَوْمِ ٱذْكُرُوا۟ نِعْمَةَ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيْكُمْ إِذْ جَعَلَ فِيكُمْ أَنۢبِيَآءَ وَجَعَلَكُم مُّلُوكًۭا وَءَاتَىٰكُم مَّا لَمْ يُؤْتِ أَحَدًۭا مِّنَ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	when	Moosa	said	to	his	people,	“O	my	
people!	 Remember	 Allah’s	 favour	 upon	
you,	that	He	created	Prophets	among	you,	
and	 made	 you	 kings,	 and	 has	 now	 given	
you	what	He	has	not	given	to	any	one	else	
in	this	world.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 jab	 Mūsā ne	 kaha	 apni	 qaum se	 aey	
meri	qaum Allah	ka	ehsān	apne	ūper	yād	
karo	ke	tum	meiñ	se	Paighamber	kiye	aur	
tumheñ	 bādshāh	 kiya	 aur	 tumheñ	 woh	
diya	jo	āj	sāre	jahān	meiñ	kisi	ko	na	diya

arabicText: وَإِذْ قَالَ مُوسَىٰ لِقَوْمِهِۦ يَـٰقَوْمِ ٱذْكُرُوا۟ نِعْمَةَ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيْكُمْ إِذْ جَعَلَ فِيكُمْ أَنۢبِيَآءَ وَجَعَلَكُم مُّلُوكًۭا وَءَاتَىٰكُم مَّا يَـٰقَوْمِ ٱدْخُلُوا۟ ٱلْأَرْضَ ٱلْمُقَدَّسَةَ ٱلَّتِى كَتَبَ ٱللَّهُ لَكُمْ وَلَا تَرْتَدُّوا۟ عَلَىٰٓ أَدْبَارِكُمْ فَتَنقَلِبُوا۟ خَـٰسِرِينَ
englishTranslationText:
“O	my	people!	Enter	the	holy	land	which	Allah has	decreed	for	you	and	do	not	turn	back,	for	you	
will	turn	back	as	losers.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	qaum us	Pāk	zameen	meiñ	dākhil	ho	jo	
Allah	ne	tumhāre	liye	likhi	hai	aur	peechhe	na	palto	ke	nuqsān	par	paltoge

arabicText: قَالُوا۟ يَـٰمُوسَىٰٓ إِنَّ فِيهَا قَوْمًۭا جَبَّارِينَ وَإِنَّا لَن نَّدْخُلَهَا حَتَّىٰ يَخْرُجُوا۟ مِنْهَا فَإِن يَخْرُجُوا۟ مِنْهَا فَإِنَّا دَٰخِلُونَ
englishTranslationText:
They	said,	“O	Moosa!	In	it	lives	a	very	strong	nation	- and	we	shall	never	enter	it,	until	they	have	
gone	away	from	there;	so	when	they	have	gone	away	from	there,	we	will	enter	it.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Bole	aey	Mūsā usme	to	bade zabardast	log	haiñ	aur	ham	us	meiñ	hargiz	dākhil	na	hoñge	jab	tak	
woh	wahāñ	se	nikal	na	jāyeñ	to	ham	wahāñ	jāyeñge

arabicText: قَالَ رَجُلَانِ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ يَخَافُونَ أَنْعَمَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيْهِمَا ٱدْخُلُوا۟ عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلْبَابَ فَإِذَا دَخَلْتُمُوهُ فَإِنَّكُمْ غَـٰلِبُونَ ۚ وَعَلَى ٱللَّهِ فَتَوَكَّلُوٓا۟ إِن كُنتُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
englishTranslationText:
So	two	men	who	were	among	those	who	feared	Allah and	whom	Allah had	favoured	said,	“Enter	
upon	them	by	force,	through	the	gate;	if	you	enter	the	gate,	victory	will	be	yours;	and	depend	only	
upon	Allah,	if	you	have	faith.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Do	mard	ke	Allah	se	darne	wāloñ	meiñ	se	the	Allah	ne	unheñ	nawāza bole	ke	zabardasti	darwāze	
meiñ	un	par	dākhil	ho	agar	tum	darwāze	meiñ	dākhil	ho	gaye	to	tumhāra	hi	ghalba	hai	aur	Allah	
hi	par	bharosa	karo	agar	tumheñ	Imān	hai

arabicText: قَالُوا۟ يَـٰمُوسَىٰٓ إِنَّا لَن نَّدْخُلَهَآ أَبَدًۭا مَّا دَامُوا۟ فِيهَا ۖ فَٱذْهَبْ أَنتَ وَرَبُّكَ فَقَـٰتِلَآ إِنَّا هَـٰهُنَا قَـٰعِدُونَ
englishTranslationText:
They	said,	“O	Moosa!	We	will	never	enter	it	
whilst	they	are	there,	so	you	and	your	Lord	
go	and	fight	- we	shall	remain	seated	here.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Bole	 aey	 Mūsā ham	 to	 wahāñ	 kabhi	 na	
jāyeñge	jab	tak	woh	wahāñ	haiñ	to	āp	jāiye	
aur	āpka	Rab	tum	donoñ	lado	ham	yahān	
baithe	haiñ

arabicText: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّى لَآ أَمْلِكُ إِلَّا نَفْسِى وَأَخِى ۖ فَٱفْرُقْ بَيْنَنَا وَبَيْنَ ٱلْقَوْمِ ٱلْفَـٰسِقِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Said	 Moosa,	 “My	 Lord!	 I	 have	 no	 control	
except	 over	 myself	 and	 my	 brother,	 so	
keep	 us	 separated	 from	 the	 disobedient	
nation.”	
(Do not count us among them).
romanUrduTranslationText:
Mūsā ne	 arz	 ki	 ke	 aey	 mere	 Rab	 mujhe	
ikhtiyār	 nahiñ	magar	apna	aur	apne	 bhāi	
ka	to	tu ham	ko	in	behukmoñ	se	juda	rakh

arabicText: قَالَ فَإِنَّهَا مُحَرَّمَةٌ عَلَيْهِمْ ۛ أَرْبَعِينَ سَنَةًۭ ۛ يَتِيهُونَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ فَلَا تَأْسَ عَلَى ٱلْقَوْمِ ٱلْفَـٰسِقِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Said	 Allah,	 “The	 (holy)	 land	 is	 therefore	
forbidden	 for	 them	 for	 forty	 years;	 they	
will	wander	in	the	earth;	so	do	not	grieve	
for	these	disobedient	people.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Mūsā ne	 arz	 ki	 ke	 aey	 mere	 Rab	 mujhe	
ikhtiyār	 nahiñ	magar	apna	aur	apne	 bhāi	
ka	to	tu ham	ko	in	behukmoñ	se	juda	rakh

arabicText: ۞ وَٱتْلُ عَلَيْهِمْ نَبَأَ ٱبْنَىْ ءَادَمَ بِٱلْحَقِّ إِذْ قَرَّبَا قُرْبَانًۭا فَتُقُبِّلَ مِنْ أَحَدِهِمَا وَلَمْ يُتَقَبَّلْ مِنَ ٱلْـَٔاخَرِ قَالَ لَأَقْتُلَنَّكَ ۖ قَالَ إِنَّمَا يَتَقَبَّلُ ٱللَّهُ مِنَ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	recite	to	them	the	true	tale	of	the	two	
sons	of	Adam;	when	both of	them	offered	a	
sacrifice	each	- hence	 the	 sacrifice	 of	 one	
was	 accepted	 and	 not	 accepted	 from	 the	
other;	he	(the	other)	said,	“I	swear	I	will	kill	
you”;	 he	 answered,	 “Allah accepts	 only	
from	the	pious.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 unheñ	 padh	 kar	 sunāo	 Ādam	 ke	 do	
betoñ	ki	sachchi	khabar	jab	donoñ	ne	ek	ek	
niyāz	(qurbāni)	pesh	ki	to	ek	ki	qabool	huyi	
aur	 doosre	 ki	 na	 qabool	 huyi	 bola	 qasam	
hai	main	 tujhe	 qatl	 kar	 dūnga	 kaha	Allah	
usi	se	qabool	karta	hai	jise	dar	hai

arabicText: لَئِنۢ بَسَطتَ إِلَىَّ يَدَكَ لِتَقْتُلَنِى مَآ أَنَا۠ بِبَاسِطٍۢ يَدِىَ إِلَيْكَ لِأَقْتُلَكَ ۖ إِنِّىٓ أَخَافُ ٱللَّهَ رَبَّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
englishTranslationText:
“Indeed,	 if	 you	 do	 extend	 your	 hand	
against	me	to	kill	me,	I	will	not	extend	my	
hand	against	 you	 to	 kill	 you;	 I	 fear	Allah,	
the	Lord	Of	The	Creation.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Beshak	 agar	 tu	 apna	 hāth	 mujh	 par	
badhāyega	 ke	 mujhe	 qatl	 kare	 to	 maiñ	
apna	hāth	tujh	par	na	badhāūnga	ke	tujhe	
qatl	karuñ	maiñ	Allah	se	darta	huñ	jo	Mālik	
sāre	jahān	ka

arabicText: إِنِّىٓ أُرِيدُ أَن تَبُوٓأَ بِإِثْمِى وَإِثْمِكَ فَتَكُونَ مِنْ أَصْحَـٰبِ ٱلنَّارِ ۚ وَذَٰلِكَ جَزَٰٓؤُا۟ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
englishTranslationText:
“I	 only	 desire	 that	 you	alone	 should	 bear	
my	 sin	 and	 your	 own	 sin	 - hence	 you	
become	of	the	people	of	hell;	and	that	is	the	
proper	punishment	of	the	unjust.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Maiñ	 to	 ye	 chāhta	 huñ	 ke	 mera	 aur	 tera	
gunāh donoñ	tere	hi	palle	pade	to	tu	to	dozakhi	ho	jāye	aur	be-insāfoñ	ki	yahi	sazā	hai

arabicText: فَطَوَّعَتْ لَهُۥ نَفْسُهُۥ قَتْلَ أَخِيهِ فَقَتَلَهُۥ فَأَصْبَحَ مِنَ ٱلْخَـٰسِرِينَ
englishTranslationText: So	his	soul	incited	him	to	kill	his	brother	- he	therefore	killed	him,	and	was	therefore	ruined.
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	uske	nafs	ne	use	bhāi	ke	qatl	ka	chāo	dilāya	(qatl	par	ubhāra)	to	use	qatl	kar	diya	to	rah	gaya	
nuqsān	meiñ

arabicText: فَبَعَثَ ٱللَّهُ غُرَابًۭا يَبْحَثُ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ لِيُرِيَهُۥ كَيْفَ يُوَٰرِى سَوْءَةَ أَخِيهِ ۚ قَالَ يَـٰوَيْلَتَىٰٓ أَعَجَزْتُ أَنْ أَكُونَ مِثْلَ هَـٰذَا ٱلْغُرَابِ فَأُوَٰرِىَ سَوْءَةَ أَخِى ۖ فَأَصْبَحَ مِنَ ٱلنَّـٰدِمِينَ
englishTranslationText:
So	Allah sent	a	crow	scratching	the	ground,	to	show	him	how	to	hide	his	brother’s	corpse;	he	said,	
“Woe	to	me!	I	was	not	even	capable	enough	to	be	like this	crow,	so	I	would	hide	my	brother’s	
corpse”;	and	he	turned	remorseful.
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	Allah	ne	ek	kawwa	bheja	zameen	kuredta	keh	use	dikhāye	kyuñker	(kis	tarah)	apne	bhāi	ki	
lāsh	chupāye	bola	hāye	kharābi	maiñ	is	kawwe	jaisa	bhi	na	ho	saka	ke	maiñ	apne	bhāi	ki	lāsh	
chupāta	to	pachtāta rah	gaya

arabicText: مِنْ أَجْلِ ذَٰلِكَ كَتَبْنَا عَلَىٰ بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ أَنَّهُۥ مَن قَتَلَ نَفْسًۢا بِغَيْرِ نَفْسٍ أَوْ فَسَادٍۢ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ فَكَأَنَّمَا قَتَلَ ٱلنَّاسَ جَمِيعًۭا وَمَنْ أَحْيَاهَا فَكَأَنَّمَآ أَحْيَا ٱلنَّاسَ جَمِيعًۭا ۚ وَلَقَدْ جَآءَتْهُمْ رُسُلُنَا بِٱلْبَيِّنَـٰتِ ثُمَّ إِنَّ كَثِيرًۭا مِّنْهُم بَعْدَ ذَٰلِكَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ لَمُسْرِفُونَ
englishTranslationText:
For	 this	 reason;	 We	 decreed	 for	 the	
Descendants	of	Israel	that	whoever	kills	a	
human	 being	 except	 in	 lieu	 of	 killing	 or	
causing	turmoil	in	the	earth,	so	it	shall	be	
as	 if	 he	 had	 killed	 all	 mankind;	 and	
whoever	saves	the	life	of	one	person,	is	as	
if	he	had	saved	the	life	of	all	mankind;	and	
undoubtedly	Our	Noble	Messengers	came	
to	them	with	clear	proofs	- then	after	this	
indeed	many	of	them	are	oppressors	in	the	
earth.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Is	sabas	se	hamne	bani-Isrā’il	par	likh	diya	
ke	jisne	koi	jān	qatl	ki	be-ghair	jān	ke	badle	
ya	zameen	meiñ	fasād	ke	to	goya	usne	sab	
logoñ	 ko	 qatl	 kiya	aur	jisne	ek	jān	 ko	jila	
liya	us	ne	goya	sab	logoñ	ko	jila	liya	aur	beshak	 unke	 pās	 hamāre	 Rasool	 raushan	
daliloñ	ke	sāth	āaye	phir	be-shak	un	meiñ	
bahut	iske	b’ad	zameen	meiñ	zyādati	karne	
wāle	haiñ

arabicText: إِنَّمَا جَزَٰٓؤُا۟ ٱلَّذِينَ يُحَارِبُونَ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ وَيَسْعَوْنَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ فَسَادًا أَن يُقَتَّلُوٓا۟ أَوْ يُصَلَّبُوٓا۟ أَوْ تُقَطَّعَ أَيْدِيهِمْ وَأَرْجُلُهُم مِّنْ خِلَـٰفٍ أَوْ يُنفَوْا۟ مِنَ ٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ لَهُمْ خِزْىٌۭ فِى ٱلدُّنْيَا ۖ وَلَهُمْ فِى ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ عَذَابٌ عَظِيمٌ
englishTranslationText:
The	 only	 reward	 of	 those	who	make	war	
upon	Allah and	His	Noble	Messenger	and	
cause	turmoil	in	the	land	is	that	they	be	all	
be	 killed	 or	 crucified,	 or	 their	 hands	 and	
feet	cut	off	from	alternate	sides,	or	they	be	
banished	 far	 away	 from	 the	 land;	 this	 is	
their	 degradation	 in	 the	 world,	 and	 for	
them	 in	 the	 Hereafter	 is	 a	 great	
punishment.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Woh	ke	Allah	aur	uske	Rasool	se	ladte	aur	
mulk	 meiñ	 fasād	 karte	 phirte	 haiñ	 unka	
badla	yahi	hai	ke	gin	gin	kar	qatl	kiye	jāyeñ	
ya	sooli	diye	jāyeñ	ya	unke	ek	taraf	ke	hāth	
aur	 doosri	 taraf	 ke	 pāon	 kāte	 jāyeñ	 ya	
zameen	 se	 door	 kar	 diye	 jāyeñ	 ye	 dunya	
meiñ	 unko	 ruswāi	 hai	 aur	 ākhirat	 meiñ	
unke	liye	bada	‘aƶāb

arabicText: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ تَابُوا۟ مِن قَبْلِ أَن تَقْدِرُوا۟ عَلَيْهِمْ ۖ فَٱعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٌۭ رَّحِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
Except those	 who	 repent	 before	 you	
apprehend	 them;	so	know	well	 that	Allah
is	Oft	Forgiving,	Most	Merciful.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Magar	woh	jinhoñ ne	tauba	kar	li	is	se	pahle	ke	tum	un	par	qābū	pāo	to	jān	lo	ke	Allah	bakhsh	ne	
wāla	maherbān	hai

arabicText: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ ٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَٱبْتَغُوٓا۟ إِلَيْهِ ٱلْوَسِيلَةَ وَجَـٰهِدُوا۟ فِى سَبِيلِهِۦ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُفْلِحُونَ
englishTranslationText:
O	People	who	Believe!	Fear	Allah,	and	seek	
the	means	towards	Him,	and	strive	in	His	cause,	in	the	hope	of	attaining	success.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	Imān	wāloñ	Allah	se	daro	aur	uski	taraf	wasila	dhūndo	aur	uski	rāh	meiñ	jihād	karo	is	ummid	
par	ke	falāh	pao

arabicText: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ لَوْ أَنَّ لَهُم مَّا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ جَمِيعًۭا وَمِثْلَهُۥ مَعَهُۥ لِيَفْتَدُوا۟ بِهِۦ مِنْ عَذَابِ يَوْمِ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ مَا تُقُبِّلَ مِنْهُمْ ۖ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
Indeed	if	the	disbelievers	owned	all	that	is	in	the	earth	and	a	similar	one	in	addition	to	it,	and	
they	offered	it	as	a	ransom	to	save	themselves	from	the	punishment	of	the	Day	of	Resurrection,	
it	would	not	be	accepted	from	them;	and	for	them	is	a	painful	punishment.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Be-shak	woh	jo	kāfir	hue	jo	kuch	chudhāyeñ	to	unse	na	liya	jāyega	aur	unke	liye	dukh	ka	‘aƶāb		
hai.

arabicText: يُرِيدُونَ أَن يَخْرُجُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلنَّارِ وَمَا هُم بِخَـٰرِجِينَ مِنْهَا ۖ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابٌۭ مُّقِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
They	will	wish	to	come	out	of	hell,	and will	
not	 come	 out	 of	 it	 - and	 for	 them	 is	 an	
unending	punishment.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Dozakh	se	nikalna	chāheñge	aur	woh	us	se	
na	 nikleñge	 aur	 unko	 dawāmi	 (hamesha	
hamesha)	ki	sazā		hai

arabicText: وَٱلسَّارِقُ وَٱلسَّارِقَةُ فَٱقْطَعُوٓا۟ أَيْدِيَهُمَا جَزَآءًۢ بِمَا كَسَبَا نَكَـٰلًۭا مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَزِيزٌ حَكِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
And	 cut	 off	 the	 hands	 of	 those	 men	 or	
women	who	are	thieves	- a	recompense	of	
their	deeds,	a	punishment	from	Allah;	and	
Allah is	Almighty,	Wise.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	jo	mard	ya	aurat	chor	ho	to	unka	hāth	
kāto	 unke	 kiye	 ka	 badla	 Allah	 ki	 taraf	 se	
sazā		aur	Allah	ghālib	hikmat	wāla	hai

arabicText: فَمَن تَابَ مِنۢ بَعْدِ ظُلْمِهِۦ وَأَصْلَحَ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَتُوبُ عَلَيْهِ ۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٌۭ رَّحِيمٌ
englishTranslationText:
So	if	one	repents	after	his	wrongdoing	and
reforms	himself,	Allah will	incline	towards	
him	 with	 His	 mercy;	 indeed	 Allah is	 Oft	
Forgiving,	Most	Merciful.
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	 jo	 apne	 zulm	 ke	 b’ad	 tauba	 kare	 aur	
sañwar	jāye	to	Allah	apni	mehar	se	us	par	
rujū’	 farmāyega	 beshak	 Allah	 bakhsh	 ne	
wāla	maherbān	hai

arabicText: أَلَمْ تَعْلَمْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَهُۥ مُلْكُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ يُعَذِّبُ مَن يَشَآءُ وَيَغْفِرُ لِمَن يَشَآءُ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍۢ قَدِيرٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
Do	you	not	know	that	to	Allah only	belongs	
the	kingship	of	the	heavens	and	the	earth?	
He	 punishes	 whomever	 He	 wills,	 and	
forgives	whomever	He	wills;	and	Allah is	
Able	to	do	all	things.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Kya	 tujhe	māloom	nahiñ	Allah	ke	liye	hai	
āsmānoñ	 aur	 zameen	 ki	 bādshāhi	 sazā		
deta	 hai	 jise	 chāhe	 aur	 bakhshta	 hai	 jise	
chāhe	aur	Allah	sab	kuch	kar	sakta	hai

arabicText: ۞ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلرَّسُولُ لَا يَحْزُنكَ ٱلَّذِينَ يُسَـٰرِعُونَ فِى ٱلْكُفْرِ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ قَالُوٓا۟ ءَامَنَّا بِأَفْوَٰهِهِمْ وَلَمْ تُؤْمِن قُلُوبُهُمْ ۛ وَمِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ هَادُوا۟ ۛ سَمَّـٰعُونَ لِلْكَذِبِ سَمَّـٰعُونَ لِقَوْمٍ ءَاخَرِينَ لَمْ يَأْتُوكَ ۖ يُحَرِّفُونَ ٱلْكَلِمَ مِنۢ بَعْدِ مَوَاضِعِهِۦ ۖ يَقُولُونَ إِنْ أُوتِيتُمْ هَـٰذَا فَخُذُوهُ وَإِن لَّمْ تُؤْتَوْهُ فَٱحْذَرُوا۟ ۚ وَمَن يُرِدِ ٱللَّهُ فِتْنَتَهُۥ فَلَن تَمْلِكَ لَهُۥ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ شَيْـًٔا ۚ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَمْ يُرِدِ ٱللَّهُ أَن يُطَهِّرَ قُلُوبَهُمْ ۚ لَهُمْ فِى ٱلدُّنْيَا خِزْىٌۭ ۖ وَلَهُمْ فِى ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ عَذَابٌ عَظِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
O	Noble	Messenger	(Prophet	Muhammad -
peace	 and	 blessings	 be	 upon	 him)!	Do	 not	
let	 yourself	 be	 aggrieved	 by	 the	 people	
who	 rush	 towards	 disbelief	 - those	 who	
say	 with	 their	 mouths,	 “We	 believe”	 but	
whose	hearts	are not	Muslims;	and	some	
Jews;	they	listen	a	great	deal	to	falsehood,	
and	 to	 other	 people	who	 do	 not	 come	 to	
you;	 shifting	 Allah’s	 Words	 from	 their	
correct	places;	and	say,	“If	this	command	is	given	to	you,	obey	it,	but	if	this	is	not	given	to	you,	
then	refrain”;	and	the	one	whom	Allah wills	to	send	astray,	you	will	never	be	able	to	help	him	in	
the	least	against	Allah;	 they	are	 those	whose	 hearts	Allah did	 not	will	 to	 cleanse;	 for	 them	is	
disgrace	in	this	world,	and	for	them	is	a	great	punishment	in	the	Hereafter.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	 Rasool	 tumheñ	 ghamghin	 na	 kareñ	
woh	jo	kufr	par	doudhte	haiñ	kuch woh	jo	
apne	muñh	se	kahte	haiñ	ham	Imān	lāye	aur	unke	dil	Musalmān	nahiñ	kuchh	Yahūdi	jhoot	khoob	
sunte	 hain	 logoñ	 ki	 khoob	 sunte	 haiñ	 jo	 tumhāre	 pās	 hāzir	 na	 huye	 Allah	 ki	 bātoñ	 ko	 unke	
thikānoñ	ke	b’ad	badal	dete	haiñ	kahte	haiñ	ye	ḥukm	 tumheñ	mile	 to mano	aur	ye	na	mile	 to	
bacho	aur	jise	Allah	gumrāh	karna	chāhe	to	hargiz	tu	Allah	se	uska	kuch	bana	na	sakega	woh	haiñ	
ke	Allah	ne	unka	dil	pāk	karna	na	chāha	unheñ	duniya	meiñ	ruswāi	hai	aur	unheñ	ākhirat	meiñ	
bada	‘aƶāb.

arabicText: سَمَّـٰعُونَ لِلْكَذِبِ أَكَّـٰلُونَ لِلسُّحْتِ ۚ فَإِن جَآءُوكَ فَٱحْكُم بَيْنَهُمْ أَوْ أَعْرِضْ عَنْهُمْ ۖ وَإِن تُعْرِضْ عَنْهُمْ فَلَن يَضُرُّوكَ شَيْـًۭٔا ۖ وَإِنْ حَكَمْتَ فَٱحْكُم بَيْنَهُم بِٱلْقِسْطِ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُحِبُّ ٱلْمُقْسِطِينَ
englishTranslationText:
The	 excessively	 eager	 listeners	 of	
falsehood,	 extreme	 devourers	 of	 the	
forbidden;	so	if	they	come	humbly	to	you	
(Prophet	Muhammad - peace	and	blessings	
be	upon	him),	judge	between	them	or	shun	
them;	and	if	you	turn	away	from	them	they	
cannot	harm	you	at	all;	and	if	you	do	judge	
between	them,	judge	with	fairness;	indeed	
Allah loves	the	equitable
romanUrduTranslationText:
Bade jhoot	sunne	wāle	bade harām-khor	to	
agar	tumhāre	huzoor	hāzir	hoñ	to	un	meiñ	
faisla	 farmāo	 ya	 unse	 muñh	 pher	 lo	 aur	
agar	 tum	 unse	 muñh pher	 loge	 to	 woh	
tumhāra	kuchh	na	bigādeñge	aur	agar	un	
meiñ	 faisla	 farmāo	 to	insāf	 se	 faisla	 karo	
be-shak	insāf	wāle	Allah	ko	pasand	haiñ

arabicText: وَكَيْفَ يُحَكِّمُونَكَ وَعِندَهُمُ ٱلتَّوْرَىٰةُ فِيهَا حُكْمُ ٱللَّهِ ثُمَّ يَتَوَلَّوْنَ مِنۢ بَعْدِ ذَٰلِكَ ۚ وَمَآ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ بِٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	why	should	they	wish	to	be	judged	by	
you,	when	they	have	the	Taurat	with	them,	
in	which	exist	the	commands	of	Allah and	
yet	they	turn	away	 from	it?	And	they	will	
not	accept	faith.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 woh	 tumse	 kyuñkar	 faisla	 chāheñge	
hālānke	unke	pās	Taurait hai	jis	meiñ	Allah	
ka	 ḥukm	 maujood	 hai	 ba’iñ	 hamañ	 (iske	
bawajood)	 usi	 se	 muñh pherte	 haiñ	 aur	
woh	Imān	lāne	wāle	nahiñ

arabicText: إِنَّآ أَنزَلْنَا ٱلتَّوْرَىٰةَ فِيهَا هُدًۭى وَنُورٌۭ ۚ يَحْكُمُ بِهَا ٱلنَّبِيُّونَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَسْلَمُوا۟ لِلَّذِينَ هَادُوا۟ وَٱلرَّبَّـٰنِيُّونَ وَٱلْأَحْبَارُ بِمَا ٱسْتُحْفِظُوا۟ مِن كِتَـٰبِ ٱللَّهِ وَكَانُوا۟ عَلَيْهِ شُهَدَآءَ ۚ فَلَا تَخْشَوُا۟ ٱلنَّاسَ وَٱخْشَوْنِ وَلَا تَشْتَرُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِى ثَمَنًۭا قَلِيلًۭا ۚ وَمَن لَّمْ يَحْكُم بِمَآ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Undoubtedly	We	sent	down	the	Taurat,	in	
which	is	guidance	and	light;	the	Jews	were	
commanded	 according	 to	 it	 by	 Our	
obedient	Prophets,	and	the	rabbis	and	the	
religious	jurists	for	they	were	commanded	
to	 protect	 Allah’s	 Book,	 and	 were	
witnesses	to	it;	so	do	not	fear	men,	and	fear	
Me,	and	do	not	exchange	My	verses	for	an	
abject	price;	and	whoever	does	not	judge	
according	to	what	is	sent	down	by	Allah - it	
is	they	who	are	disbelievers.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Be-shak	 ham	 ne	 Taurait utāri	 us	 meiñ	
hidāyat	aur	Noor	hai	uske	mutabiq	Yahūd	
ko	ḥukm	 dete	 the	 hamāre	 farmāñ	 bardār	
Nabi	 aur	 Ālim	 aur	 Faqih	 ke	 unse	 KitābUllah ki	 hifāzat	 chāhi	 gayi	 thi	 wo	 us	 par	
gawah	the	to	logoñ	se	khouf	na	karo	aur	mujhse	daro	aur	meri	Āyatoñ	ke	badle	zaleel	qeemat	na	
lo	aur	jo	Allah	ke	utāre	par	ḥukm	na	kare	wohi	log	kāfir	haiñ

arabicText: وَكَتَبْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ فِيهَآ أَنَّ ٱلنَّفْسَ بِٱلنَّفْسِ وَٱلْعَيْنَ بِٱلْعَيْنِ وَٱلْأَنفَ بِٱلْأَنفِ وَٱلْأُذُنَ بِٱلْأُذُنِ وَٱلسِّنَّ بِٱلسِّنِّ وَٱلْجُرُوحَ قِصَاصٌۭ ۚ فَمَن تَصَدَّقَ بِهِۦ فَهُوَ كَفَّارَةٌۭ لَّهُۥ ۚ وَمَن لَّمْ يَحْكُم بِمَآ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلظَّـٰلِمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	in	 the	Taurat,	We	made	it	obligatory	
upon	them	that,	“A	life	(is	the	retribution)	for	a	life,	and	an	eye	for	an	eye,	and	a	nose	for	a	nose,	
and	an	ear	 for	an	ear,	and	a	tooth	 for	a	tooth,	and	 for	wounds	is	a	retribution”;	then	whoever	
willingly	 agrees	 to	 retribution,	 it	 shall	 redeem	 him	 of	 his	 sin;	 and	 whoever	 does	 not	 judge	
according	to	what	is	sent	down	by	Allah - it	is	they	who	are	the	unjust.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	hamne	Taurait		meiñ	unpar	wājib	kiya	ke	jān	ke	badle	jān	aur	āñkh	ke	badle	āañkh	aur	nāk	
badle	nāk	aur	kān	ka	badle	kān	aur	dāñt	ka	badle	dāñt	aur	zakhmoñ	meiñ	badla	hai	phir	jo	dil	ki	
khushi	se	badla	karāwe	to	uska	gunāh	utār	dega	aur	jo	Allah	ke	utāre	par	ḥukm	na	kare	to	wahi	
log	zalim	haiñ

arabicText: وَقَفَّيْنَا عَلَىٰٓ ءَاثَـٰرِهِم بِعِيسَى ٱبْنِ مَرْيَمَ مُصَدِّقًۭا لِّمَا بَيْنَ يَدَيْهِ مِنَ ٱلتَّوْرَىٰةِ ۖ وَءَاتَيْنَـٰهُ ٱلْإِنجِيلَ فِيهِ هُدًۭى وَنُورٌۭ وَمُصَدِّقًۭا لِّمَا بَيْنَ يَدَيْهِ مِنَ ٱلتَّوْرَىٰةِ وَهُدًۭى وَمَوْعِظَةًۭ لِّلْمُتَّقِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	We	brought	Eisa the	son	of	Maryam,	
following	the	footsteps	of	those	Prophets,	
confirming	the	Taurat	which	preceded	him	
- and	 We	 bestowed	 upon	 him	 the	 Injeel	
(Bible)	in	which	is	guidance	and	light,	and	
confirms	the	Taurat	which	preceded	it,	and	
a	guidance	and	an	advice	to the	pious.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 Ham	 un	 Nabiyoñ	 ke	 peechhe	 unke	
nishāne	qadam	par	Ísa	bin	Maryam ko	lāye	
tasdiq	karta	hua	Taurait		ki	jo	is	se	pahle	
thi	 aur	 hamne	 use	 Injeel ‘ata	 ki	 jis	 meiñ	
Hidāyat aur	Noor hai	aur	tasdiq	farmāti	hai	
Taurait		ki	ke is	se	pahle	thi	aur	hidāyat	aur	
nasihat	parhez-gāroñ	ko

arabicText: وَلْيَحْكُمْ أَهْلُ ٱلْإِنجِيلِ بِمَآ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ فِيهِ ۚ وَمَن لَّمْ يَحْكُم بِمَآ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْفَـٰسِقُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 the	 People	 of	 Injeel	 must	 judge	 by	
what	 Allah has	 sent	 down	 in	 it;	 and	
whoever	does	not	judge	according	to	what	
is	sent	down	by	Allah - it	is	 they	who	are	
the	sinners.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 chāhiye	 ke	 Injeel wāle	 ḥukm	 kareñ	
uspar	jo	Allah	ne	us	meiñ	utāra	aur	jo	Allah	
ke	utāre	par	ḥukm	na	kare	wahi	log	 fāsiq	
haiñ

arabicText: وَأَنزَلْنَآ إِلَيْكَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ بِٱلْحَقِّ مُصَدِّقًۭا لِّمَا بَيْنَ يَدَيْهِ مِنَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ وَمُهَيْمِنًا عَلَيْهِ ۖ فَٱحْكُم بَيْنَهُم بِمَآ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ ۖ وَلَا تَتَّبِعْ أَهْوَآءَهُمْ عَمَّا جَآءَكَ مِنَ ٱلْحَقِّ ۚ لِكُلٍّۢ جَعَلْنَا مِنكُمْ شِرْعَةًۭ وَمِنْهَاجًۭا ۚ وَلَوْ شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ لَجَعَلَكُمْ أُمَّةًۭ وَٰحِدَةًۭ وَلَـٰكِن لِّيَبْلُوَكُمْ فِى مَآ ءَاتَىٰكُمْ ۖ فَٱسْتَبِقُوا۟ ٱلْخَيْرَٰتِ ۚ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ مَرْجِعُكُمْ جَمِيعًۭا فَيُنَبِّئُكُم بِمَا كُنتُمْ فِيهِ تَخْتَلِفُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 O	 dear	 Prophet	(Muhammad - peace	
and	 blessings	 be	 upon	 him)	We	 have	 sent	
down	the	true	Book	upon	you,	confirming	
the	Books	preceding	it,	and	a	protector	and	
witness	 over	 them	 - therefore	 judge	
between	 them	 according	 to	 what	 is	 sent	
down	 by	 Allah,	 and	 O	 listener,	 do	 not	
follow	their	desires,	abandoning	the	truth	
which	has come	to	you;	We	have	appointed	
for	you	all,	a	separate	(religious)	law	and	a	
way;	 and	 had	Allah willed	He	 could	 have	
made	you	one	nation,	but	the	purpose	(His	
will)	is	 to	 test	 you	 by	 what	He	 has	 given	
you,	therefore	seek	to	surpass	one	another	
in	good	deeds;	towards	Allah only	you	will	
all	 return,	 so	 He	 will	 inform	 you	
concerning	 the	 matter	 in	 which	 you	
disputed
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 aey	 Mehboob Hamne	 tumhāri	 taraf	
sachchi	 kitāb	 utāri	 agli	 kitāboñ	 ki	 tasdiq	
farmāti	aur	unpar	muhāfiz	wa	gawāh	to	un	
meiñ	faisla	karo	Allah	ke	utāre	se	aur	aey	
sunne	wāle	unki	khwāhishoñ	ki	pairwi	na	
karna	apne	pās	āaya	hua	haq	chhodh	kar	
hamne	 tum	 sab	 ke	liye	ek	ek	 shari’at	aur	
rasta	rakha	aur	Allah	chahta	to	tum	sab	ko	
ek	 hi	 ummat	 kar	 deta	magar	manzoor	 ye	
hai	 ke	 jo	 kuchh	 tumheñ	 diya	 us	 meiñ	
tumheñ	 āzmāye	 to	 bhalāiyoñ	 ki	 taraf	
sabqat	chāho	tum	sabka	phirna	Allah	hi	ki	
taraf	hai	to	woh	tumheñ	batā	dega	jis	bāt	
meiñ	tum	jhagadhte	the

arabicText: وَأَنِ ٱحْكُم بَيْنَهُم بِمَآ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ وَلَا تَتَّبِعْ أَهْوَآءَهُمْ وَٱحْذَرْهُمْ أَن يَفْتِنُوكَ عَنۢ بَعْضِ مَآ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ إِلَيْكَ ۖ فَإِن تَوَلَّوْا۟ فَٱعْلَمْ أَنَّمَا يُرِيدُ ٱللَّهُ أَن يُصِيبَهُم بِبَعْضِ ذُنُوبِهِمْ ۗ وَإِنَّ كَثِيرًۭا مِّنَ ٱلنَّاسِ لَفَـٰسِقُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	therefore,	O	Muslims,	judge	between	them	according	to	what	is	sent	down	by	Allah,	and	do	
not	 follow	 their	 desires,	and	 be	 cautious	 of	 them	 so	 that	 they	may	 not	 divert	 you	 from	 some	
commands	which	have	been	sent	down	to	you;	then	if	they	turn	away,	know	that	Allah’s	will	is	to	
punish	them	for	some	of	their	sins;	and	indeed	many	men	are	disobedient.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	ye	ke	aey	Musalmān	Allah	ke	utāre	huye	par	ḥukm	kar	aur	unki	khwāhishoñ	par	na	chal	Ke	
kahiñ	tujhe	laghzish	(bahka)	na	deñ	kisi	ḥukm	meiñ	jo	teri	taraf	utra	phir	agar	woh	muñh		phereñ	
to	jān	lo	ke	Allah	unke	b’az	gunāhoñ	ki	saza	unko	pahuñchāna	chāhta	hai	aur	be-shak	bahut	ādmi	
be-ḥukm	haiñ

arabicText: أَفَحُكْمَ ٱلْجَـٰهِلِيَّةِ يَبْغُونَ ۚ وَمَنْ أَحْسَنُ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ حُكْمًۭا لِّقَوْمٍۢ يُوقِنُونَ
englishTranslationText:
So	do	they	wish	a	judgement	of	ignorance?	And whose	judgement	is	better	than	that	of	Allah,	for	
the	people	who	are	certain?
romanUrduTranslationText: To	kya	jāhiliyat	ka	ḥukm	chāhte	haiñ	aur	Allah	se	behtar	kiska	ḥukm	yaqeen	wāloñ	ke	liye.

arabicText: ۞ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ لَا تَتَّخِذُوا۟ ٱلْيَهُودَ وَٱلنَّصَـٰرَىٰٓ أَوْلِيَآءَ ۘ بَعْضُهُمْ أَوْلِيَآءُ بَعْضٍۢ ۚ وَمَن يَتَوَلَّهُم مِّنكُمْ فَإِنَّهُۥ مِنْهُمْ ۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَهْدِى ٱلْقَوْمَ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
englishTranslationText:
O	 People	 who	 Believe!	 Do	 not	 make	 the	
Jews	and	the	Christians	your	friends;	they	
are	 friends	 of	 one	 another;	 and	 whoever	
among	you	befriends	them,	is	one	of	them;	
indeed	Allah does	not	guide	the	unjust.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	Imān	 wāloñ	 Yahūd-o-Nasāra	 ko	 dost	
na	 banāo	wo	āpas	meiñ	ek	dūsre	 ke	dost	
haiñ	 aur	 tum	 meiñ	 jo	 koi	 unse	 dosti	
rakhega	 woh	 unhi	 meiñ	 se	 hai	 be-shak	
Allah	be-insāfoñ	ko	rāh	nahiñ	deta

arabicText: فَتَرَى ٱلَّذِينَ فِى قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٌۭ يُسَـٰرِعُونَ فِيهِمْ يَقُولُونَ نَخْشَىٰٓ أَن تُصِيبَنَا دَآئِرَ ةٌۭ ۚ فَعَسَى ٱللَّهُ أَن يَأْتِىَ بِٱلْفَتْحِ أَوْ أَمْرٍۢ مِّنْ عِندِهِۦ فَيُصْبِحُوا۟ عَلَىٰ مَآ أَسَرُّوا۟ فِىٓ أَنفُسِهِمْ نَـٰدِمِينَ
englishTranslationText:
You	will	now	see	those	in	whose	hearts	is	
a	disease,	that	they	rush	towards	the	Jews	
and	the	Christians,	saying,	“We	fear	that	a	
misfortune	will	possibly	befall	us”;	so	it	is	
likely	that	Allah may	soon	bring	victory,	or	
a	 command	 from	 Himself,	 so	 they	 will
remain	regretting	what	they	had	hidden	in	
their	hearts
romanUrduTranslationText:
Ab	 tum	 unheñ	 dekhoge	 jinke	 diloñ	 meiñ	
āzār	 (bimāri)	 hai	 ke	 Yahūd-o-Nasāra	 ki	
taraf	 dhoudte	 haiñ	 kahte	 haiñ	 ham	 darte	
haiñ	 ke	 ham	 par	 koi	 gardish	 ā jāye	 to	
nazdeek	 hai	 ke	 Allah	 fatah	 lāye	 ya	 apni	
taraf	se	koi	ḥukm	phir	uspar	jo	apne	diloñ	
meiñ	chupāya	tha	pachhtāte	rah	jāyeñ

arabicText: وَيَقُولُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ أَهَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ ٱلَّذِينَ أَقْسَمُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ جَهْدَ أَيْمَـٰنِهِمْ ۙ إِنَّهُمْ لَمَعَكُمْ ۚ حَبِطَتْ أَعْمَـٰلُهُمْ فَأَصْبَحُوا۟ خَـٰسِرِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	the	believers	say,	“Are	these	the	ones	
who	 swore	 by	 Allah most	 vehemently	 in	
their	 oaths,	 that	 they	 are	 with	 you?”	 All	
their	 deeds	 are	 destroyed,	 so	 they	 are	
ruined.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 Imān	 wāle	 kahte	 haiñ	 kya	 yahi	 haiñ	
jinhoñe	Allah	ki	qasam	khāyi	thi	apne	halaf	
(‘ahad	)	poori	koshish	se	ke	woh	tumhāre	
sāth	 haiñ	 unka	 kiya	 dharā	 sab	 ikārat	
(zā’ey)	gaya	to	woh	rah	gaye	nuqsān	meiñ

arabicText: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ مَن يَرْتَدَّ مِنكُمْ عَن دِينِهِۦ فَسَوْفَ يَأْتِى ٱللَّهُ بِقَوْمٍۢ يُحِبُّهُمْ وَيُحِبُّونَهُۥٓ أَذِلَّةٍ عَلَى ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ أَعِزَّةٍ عَلَى ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ يُجَـٰهِدُونَ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ وَلَا يَخَافُونَ لَوْمَةَ لَآئِمٍۢ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ فَضْلُ ٱللَّهِ يُؤْتِيهِ مَن يَشَآءُ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ وَٰسِعٌ عَلِيمٌ
englishTranslationText:
O	 People	 who	 Believe!	 Whoever	 among	
you	reneges	from	his	religion,	so	Allah will	
soon	bring	a	people	who	are	His	beloved	
ones	 and	 Allah is	 their	 beloved,	 lenient	
with	 the	 Muslims	 and	 stern	 towards	
disbelievers	 - they	 will	 strive	 in	 Allah’s	
cause,	 and	 not	 fear	 the	 criticism	 of	 any	
accuser;	 this	 is	 Allah’s	 munificence,	 He	
may	give	to	whomever	He	wills;	and	Allah
is	the	Most	Capable,	the	All	Knowing.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	Imān	wāloñ	tum	meiñ	jo	koi	apne	deen	
se	 phirega	 to	 ‘an-qareeb	 Allah	 aise	 log	
lāyega	 ke	 woh	 Allah	 ke	 piyāre	 aur	 Allah	
unka	 piyāra	 Musalmānoñ	 par	 narm	 aur	
kāfiroñ	par sakht	Allah	ki	rāh	meiñ	ladeñge	
aur	kisi	malāmat	karne	Wale	ki	malāmat	ka	
andesha	na	kareñge	ye	Allah	ka	fazl	hai	jise	
chāhe	 de	 aur	 Allah	 wus’at	 wāla	 Ílm	 wāla	
hai

arabicText: إِنَّمَا وَلِيُّكُمُ ٱللَّهُ وَرَسُولُهُۥ وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ ٱلَّذِينَ يُقِيمُونَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَيُؤْتُونَ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَهُمْ رَٰكِعُونَ
englishTranslationText:
You	do	not	have	any	 friends	except	Allah
and	His	Noble	Messenger	and	the	believers	
who	 establish	 the	 prayer	 and	 pay	 the	
charity,	and	are	bowed	down	before	Allah
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tumhāre	dost	nahiñ	magar	Allah	aur	uska	
Rasool	 aur	 Imān	 wāle	 ke	 Namāz	 qāim	
karte	haiñ	aur	Zakāt	deta	haiñ	aur	Allah	ke	
huzoor	jhuke	huye	haiñ

arabicText: وَمَن يَتَوَلَّ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ فَإِنَّ حِزْبَ ٱللَّهِ هُمُ ٱلْغَـٰلِبُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	whoever	takes	Allah and	His	Noble	Messenger	and	the	Muslims	as	friends	- so	undoubtedly	
only	the	party	of	Allah is	victorious.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 jo	 Allah	 aur	 uske	 Rasool	 aur	
Musalmānoñ	 ko	 apna	 dost	 banāye	 to	 beshak	Allah	hi	ka	giroh	ghalib	ha

arabicText: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ لَا تَتَّخِذُوا۟ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّخَذُوا۟ دِينَكُمْ هُزُوًۭا وَلَعِبًۭا مِّنَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُوا۟ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ مِن قَبْلِكُمْ وَٱلْكُفَّارَ أَوْلِيَآءَ ۚ وَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ إِن كُنتُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
englishTranslationText:
O	People	who	Believe!	Those	who	have	made	your	religion	a	mockery	and	a	sport,	and	those	who	
received	the	Book	before	you,	and	the	disbelievers	- do	not	befriend	any	of	them;	and	keep	fearing	
Allah,	if	you	have	faith
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	Imān	wāloñ	jinhoñe	tumhāre	deen	ko	hañsi	khel	bana	liya	hai	wo	jo	tumse	pahle	kitāb	diye	
gaye	aur	kāfir	un	meiñ	kisi	ko	apna	dost	na	banāo	aur	Allah	se	darte	raho	agar	Imān	rakhte	ho

arabicText: وَإِذَا نَادَيْتُمْ إِلَى ٱلصَّلَوٰةِ ٱتَّخَذُوهَا هُزُوًۭا وَلَعِبًۭا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمْ قَوْمٌۭ لَّا يَعْقِلُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 when	 you	 call	 to	 prayer,	 they	 mock	
and	make	fun	of	it;	this	is	because	they	are	
people	without	any	sense.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	jab	tum	Namāz	ke	liye	Azān	do	to	use	
hañsi	 khel	 banāte	 haiñ	 ye	 isliye	 ke	 woh	
nire	be	áql	log	haiñ

arabicText: وَإِذَا نَادَيْتُمْ إِلَى ٱلصَّلَوٰةِ ٱتَّخَذُوهَا هُزُوًۭا وَلَعِبًۭا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمْ قَوْمٌۭ لَّا يَعْقِلُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 when	 you	 call	 to	 prayer,	 they	 mock	
and	make	fun	of	it;	this	is	because	they	are	
people	without	any	sense.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	jab	tum	Namāz	ke	liye	Azān	do	to	use	
hañsi	 khel	 banāte	 haiñ	 ye	 isliye	 ke	 woh	
nire	be	áql	log	haiñ

arabicText: قُلْ يَـٰٓأَهْلَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ هَلْ تَنقِمُونَ مِنَّآ إِلَّآ أَنْ ءَامَنَّا بِٱللَّهِ وَمَآ أُنزِلَ إِلَيْنَا وَمَآ أُنزِلَ مِن قَبْلُ وَأَنَّ أَكْثَرَكُمْ فَـٰسِقُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Say,	“O	People	given	the	Book(s)!	What	do	
you	dislike	in	us	- except	that	we	believe	in	
Allah and	what	is	sent	down	to	us	and	what	
was	sent	down	before,	and	because	most	of	
you	are	disobedient?”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	farmāo	aey	kitābiyoñ	tumheñ	hamāra	
kya	 bura	 laga	 yahi	 na	 ke	 ham	 Imān	 lāye	
Allah	 par	 aur	 us	 par	jo	 hamāri	 taraf	 utra	
aur	uspar	jo	pahle	utra	aur	ye	ke	tum	meiñ	
aksar	be-ḥukm	(nā-farmān)	haiñ

arabicText: قُلْ هَلْ أُنَبِّئُكُم بِشَرٍّۢ مِّن ذَٰلِكَ مَثُوبَةً عِندَ ٱللَّهِ ۚ مَن لَّعَنَهُ ٱللَّهُ وَغَضِبَ عَلَيْهِ وَجَعَلَ مِنْهُمُ ٱلْقِرَدَةَ وَٱلْخَنَازِيرَ وَعَبَدَ ٱلطَّـٰغُوتَ ۚ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ شَرٌّۭ مَّكَانًۭا وَأَضَلُّ عَن سَوَآءِ ٱلسَّبِيلِ
englishTranslationText:
Say,	“Shall	I	tell	you	of	those	who	are	in	a	
worse	position	than	this,	in	Allah’s	sight?	It	
is	 those	 whom	 Allah has	 cursed	 and	 has	
wreaked	His	wrath	upon	and	turned	some	
of	 them	 into	 apes	 and	 swine,	 and	
worshippers	of	the	devil;	theirs	is	a	worse	
destination	 and	 they	 have	 wandered	
further	astray	from	the	Straight	Path.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	farmāo	kya	maiñ	bata	duñ	jo	Allah	ke	
yahān	is	se	badtar	darje	meiñ	haiñ	wo	jin	
par	 Allah	 ne	l’anat	 	 ki	 aur	 un	 par	 ghazab	
farmāya	 aur	 un	 meiñ	 se	 kar	 diye	 bandar	
aur	 su’ar	 aur	 shaitān	 ke	 pujāri	 unka	
thikāna	ziyādah	bura	hai	aur	ye	sidhi	rāh	
se	ziyādah	bahke

arabicText: وَإِذَا جَآءُوكُمْ قَالُوٓا۟ ءَامَنَّا وَقَد دَّخَلُوا۟ بِٱلْكُفْرِ وَهُمْ قَدْ خَرَجُوا۟ بِهِۦ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَكْتُمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	when	they	come	to	you,	they	say,	“We	
are	 Muslims”	 whereas	 they	 were	
disbelievers	 when	 they	 came	 in,	 and	
disbelievers	 when	 they	 went	 out;	 and	
Allah knows	very	well,	what	they	hide.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	jab	 tumhāre	pās	āayeñ	 to	 kahte	 haiñ	
ham	Musalmān	hain	aur	woh	āate	waqt	bhi	
kāfir	the	aur	jāte	waqt	bhi	kāfir	aur	Allah	
khoob	jānta	hai	jo	chhupa	rahe	haiñ

arabicText: وَتَرَىٰ كَثِيرًۭا مِّنْهُمْ يُسَـٰرِعُونَ فِى ٱلْإِثْمِ وَٱلْعُدْوَٰنِ وَأَكْلِهِمُ ٱلسُّحْتَ ۚ لَبِئْسَ مَا كَانُوا۟ يَعْمَلُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 you	 will	 see	 many	 of	 them	 rushing	
towards	sin	and	oppression,	and	to	devour	
the	 forbidden;	undoubtedly	what	 they	do	
is	extremely	evil.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	un	meiñ	 tum	bahutoñ	ko	dekhoge	ke	
gunāh	 aur	 ziyādati	 aur	 harām-khori	 par	
doudte	 haiñ	 beshak	 bahut	 hi	 bure	 kām	
karte	haiñ

arabicText: لَوْلَا يَنْهَىٰهُمُ ٱلرَّبَّـٰنِيُّونَ وَٱلْأَحْبَارُ عَن قَوْلِهِمُ ٱلْإِثْمَ وَأَكْلِهِمُ ٱلسُّحْتَ ۚ لَبِئْسَ مَا كَانُوا۟ يَصْنَعُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Why	do	not	their	priests	and	monks	forbid	
them	from	speaking	evil	and devouring	the	
forbidden?	 Undoubtedly	 what	 they	 do	 is	
extremely	evil
romanUrduTranslationText:
Unheñ	kyuñ	nahiñ	mana	karte	unke	pādri	
aur	darvesh	gunāh	ki	bāt	kahne	aur	harām	
khāne	 se	 be-shak	 bahut	 hi	 bure	 kām	 kar	
rahe	haiñ

arabicText: وَقَالَتِ ٱلْيَهُودُ يَدُ ٱللَّهِ مَغْلُولَةٌ ۚ غُلَّتْ أَيْدِيهِمْ وَلُعِنُوا۟ بِمَا قَالُوا۟ ۘ بَلْ يَدَاهُ مَبْسُوطَتَانِ يُنفِقُ كَيْفَ يَشَآءُ ۚ وَلَيَزِيدَنَّ كَثِيرًۭا مِّنْهُم مَّآ أُنزِلَ إِلَيْكَ مِن رَّبِّكَ طُغْيَـٰنًۭا وَكُفْرًۭا ۚ وَأَلْقَيْنَا بَيْنَهُمُ ٱلْعَدَٰوَةَ وَٱلْبَغْضَآءَ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ ۚ كُلَّمَآ أَوْقَدُوا۟ نَارًۭا لِّلْحَرْبِ أَطْفَأَهَا ٱللَّهُ ۚ وَيَسْعَوْنَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ فَسَادًۭا ۚ وَٱللَّهُ لَا يُحِبُّ ٱلْمُفْسِدِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 the	 Jews	 said,	 “Allah’s	 hand	 is	 tied";	
may	their	hands	be	tied	- and	they	are	accursed	for	saying	so!	In	fact,	both	His	hands	*	are	free,	
He	bestows	upon	whomever	He	wills;	and	O	dear	Prophet,	this	Book	which	has	been	sent	down	
upon	you	from	your	Lord	will	cause	many	of	them	to	advance	in	their	rebellion	and	disbelief;	and	
We	have	instilled	enmity	and	hatred	between	them	till	the	Day	of	Resurrection;	whenever	they	
ignite	the	flame	of war,	Allah extinguishes	it,	and	they	strive	to	create	chaos	in	the	land;	and	Allah
does	not	love	the	mischievous.	(*	This	is	a	metaphor	used	to	express	Allah’s	power).
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	Yahūdi	bole	Allah	ka	hāth	bañdha	hua	
hai	unhiñ	ke	hāth	bāñdhe	jāyeñ	aur	unpar	
is	 kahne	 se	 l’anat	 hai	 balke	 uske	 hāth	
kushāda	haiñ	áta	farmāta	hai	jaise	chāhe	aur	aey	Mehboob ye	jo	tumhāri	taraf	tumhāre	Rab	ke	
pās	se	utra	is	se	un	meiñ	bahutoñ	ko	sharārat	aur	kufr	meiñ	taraqqi	hogi	aur	un	meiñ	ham	ne	
Qayāmat	tak	āpas	meiñ	dushmani	aur	bair	(bughz)	dāl	diya	jab	kabhi	ladāi	ki	āsg	bhadkāte	haiñ	
Allah	use	bujha	deta	hai	aur	zameen	meiñ	fasād	ke	liye	doudte	phirte	haiñ	aur	Allah	fasādiyoñ	ko	
nhi	chāhta

arabicText: وَلَوْ أَنَّ أَهْلَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَٱتَّقَوْا۟ لَكَفَّرْنَا عَنْهُمْ سَيِّـَٔاتِهِمْ وَلَأَدْخَلْنَـٰهُمْ جَنَّـٰتِ ٱلنَّعِيمِ
englishTranslationText:
If	 the	 People	 given	 the	 Book(s)	 had	
accepted	 faith	and	been	pious,	We would	
have	certainly	redeemed	them	of	their	sins	
and	would	have	certainly	taken	them	into	
serene	Gardens.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	agar	kitāb	wāle	Imān	lāte	aur	parhezgāri	karte	to	zaroor	ham	unke	gunāh	utār	
dete	 aur	 zaroor	 unheñ	 chain	 ke	 bāghoñ	
meiñ	le	jāte

arabicText: وَلَوْ أَنَّهُمْ أَقَامُوا۟ ٱلتَّوْرَىٰةَ وَٱلْإِنجِيلَ وَمَآ أُنزِلَ إِلَيْهِم مِّن رَّبِّهِمْ لَأَكَلُوا۟ مِن فَوْقِهِمْ وَمِن تَحْتِ أَرْجُلِهِم ۚ مِّنْهُمْ أُمَّةٌۭ مُّقْتَصِدَةٌۭ ۖ وَكَثِيرٌۭ مِّنْهُمْ سَآءَ مَا يَعْمَلُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 had	 they	 kept	 the	 Taurat	 and	 the	
Injeel	 established,	 and	 what	 was	 sent	
down	towards	them	from	their	Lord,	they	
would	 have	 received	 sustenance	 from	
above	and	from	beneath	their	feet;	among	
them	 is	 a	 group	 who	 is	 fair;	 but	 most	 of	
them	commit	extremely	evil	deeds.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	agar	qāim	rakhte	Taurait aur	Injeel aur	
jo	kuch	unki	taraf	unke	Rab	ki	taraf	se	utra	
to	unheñ	rizq	milta	ūper	se	aur	unke	pāon	
ke	neeche	se	un	meiñ	koi	giroh	e’atidāl	par	
hai	aur	un	meiñ	aksar	bahut	hi	bure	kām	
kar	rahe	haiñ

arabicText: ۞ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلرَّسُولُ بَلِّغْ مَآ أُنزِلَ إِلَيْكَ مِن رَّبِّكَ ۖ وَإِن لَّمْ تَفْعَلْ فَمَا بَلَّغْتَ رِسَالَتَهُۥ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ يَعْصِمُكَ مِنَ ٱلنَّاسِ ۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَهْدِى ٱلْقَوْمَ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ
englishTranslationText:
O	Noble	Messenger	(Prophet	Muhammad -
peace	and	blessings	be	upon	him)!	Convey	
all	 what	 has	 been	 sent	 down	 upon	 you	
from	your	Lord;	and	if	you	do	not,	then	you	
have	 not	 conveyed	 any	 of	 His	 messages;	
and	Allah will	protect	you	from	the	people;	
indeed	 Allah does	 not	 guide	 the	
disbelievers.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	 Rasool	 pahuñcha	 do	 jo	 kuchh	 utra	
tumheñ	tumhāre	Rab	ki	jānib	se	aur	aisa	na	
ho	 to	 tumne	 uska	 koi	 payām	 na	
pahuñchāya	 aur	 Allah	 tumhāri	 nigehbāni	
Karega	 logoñ	 se	 beshak	 Allah	 kāfiroñ	 ko	
rāh	nahiñ	deta

arabicText: قُلْ يَـٰٓأَهْلَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ لَسْتُمْ عَلَىٰ شَىْءٍ حَتَّىٰ تُقِيمُوا۟ ٱلتَّوْرَىٰةَ وَٱلْإِنجِيلَ وَمَآ أُنزِلَ إِلَيْكُم مِّن رَّبِّكُمْ ۗ وَلَيَزِيدَنَّ كَثِيرًۭا مِّنْهُم مَّآ أُنزِلَ إِلَيْكَ مِن رَّبِّكَ طُغْيَـٰنًۭا وَكُفْرًۭا ۖ فَلَا تَأْسَ عَلَى ٱلْقَوْمِ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ
englishTranslationText:
O	Noble	Messenger	(Prophet	Muhammad -
peace	and	blessings	be	upon	him)!	Convey	
all	 what	 has	 been	 sent	 down	 upon	 you	
from	your	Lord;	and	if	you	do	not,	then	you	
have	 not	 conveyed	 any	 of	 His	 messages;	
and	Allah will	protect	you	from	the	people;	
indeed	 Allah does	 not	 guide	 the	
disbelievers.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	farma	do	aey	kitābiyoñ	tum	kuchh	bhi	
nahiñ	ho	jab	tak	na	qāim	karo	Tauret aur	
Injeel	 aur	 jo	 kuch	 tumhāri	 taraf	 tumhāre	
Rab	 ke	 pās	 se	 utra	 aur	 be-shak	 aey	
Mehboob woh	 jo	 tumhāri	 taraf	 tumhāre	
Rab	ke	pās	se	utra us	se	un	meiñ	bahutoñ	
ko	sharārat	aur	kufr	ki	aur	taraqqi	hogi	to	
tum	kāfiroñ	ka	kuch	gham	na	khāo
